languages.text: This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.
languages.original_text: Эта настройка позволяет включить или выключить отображение сложности проверок навыков в диалогах. При включенной настройке вы будете видеть уровень сложности, который необходимо преодолеть персонажу при проверке тех или иных навыков. Это поможет вам лучше понимать, насколько успешны ваши действия.

traits.locale_text: This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.

This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.

This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.

languages.text: Эта настройка позволяет включить или выключить отображение сложности проверок навыков в диалогах. При включенной настройке вы будете видеть уровень сложности, который необходимо преодолеть персонажу при проверке тех или иных навыков. Это поможет вам лучше понимать, насколько успешны ваши действия.

When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.

languages.text: 此选项允许您显示或关闭对话过程中的技能检定结果。此选项打开时，您可以看到角色在检定某些技能时需要通过的难度等级。此选项可以帮助您更好地了解您的行动有多大几率成功。
languages.original_text: This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.

traits.locale_text: 此选项允许您显示或关闭对话过程中的技能检定结果。此选项打开时，您可以看到角色在检定某些技能时需要通过的难度等级。此选项可以帮助您更好地了解您的行动有多大几率成功。

languages.text: この設定ではダイアログにスキル判定の難易度を表示、または非表示にできます。設定をオンにすると、特定のスキルを判定する際にキャラクターがクリアする必要のある難易度のレベルを確認できます。これはあなたのアクションがどれほど成功したかを、よりわかりやすくします。
languages.original_text: This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.

traits.locale_text: この設定ではダイアログにスキル判定の難易度を表示、または非表示にできます。設定をオンにすると、特定のスキルを判定する際にキャラクターがクリアする必要のある難易度のレベルを確認できます。これはあなたのアクションがどれほど成功したかを、よりわかりやすくします。

languages.text: Este ajuste te permite activar o desactivar el indicador de la dificultad de las pruebas de habilidad en los diálogos. Cuando está activado, verás el nivel de dificultad que tu personaje debe superar en cada prueba. Esto ayuda a comprender la probabilidad de que tus acciones tengan éxito.
languages.original_text: This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.

traits.locale_text: Este ajuste te permite activar o desactivar el indicador de la dificultad de las pruebas de habilidad en los diálogos. Cuando está activado, verás el nivel de dificultad que tu personaje debe superar en cada prueba. Esto ayuda a comprender la probabilidad de que tus acciones tengan éxito.

languages.text: Diese Einstellung erlaubt dir das Ein- und Ausschalten der Anzeige von Fertigkeitsprobenschwierigkeit in Dialogen. Ist die Einstellung aktiviert, siehst du den Schwierigkeitsgrad, den der Charakter bei der Probe bestimmter Fertigkeiten überwinden muss. Dadurch lässt sich leichter Nachvollziehen, wie erfolgreich einzelne Handlungen sind.
languages.original_text: This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.

traits.locale_text: Diese Einstellung erlaubt dir das Ein- und Ausschalten der Anzeige von Fertigkeitsprobenschwierigkeit in Dialogen. Ist die Einstellung aktiviert, siehst du den Schwierigkeitsgrad, den der Charakter bei der Probe bestimmter Fertigkeiten überwinden muss. Dadurch lässt sich leichter Nachvollziehen, wie erfolgreich einzelne Handlungen sind.

languages.text: Ce paramètre vous permet d'activer ou de désactiver l'affichage du niveau de difficulté des tests de compétence dans les dialogues. Lorsqu'il est activé, le niveau de difficulté auquel le personnage est confronté en testant certaines compétences est affiché. Cela vous permet de mieux appréhender la réussite de vos actions.
languages.original_text: This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.

traits.locale_text: Ce paramètre vous permet d'activer ou de désactiver l'affichage du niveau de difficulté des tests de compétences dans les dialogues. Lorsqu'il est activé, le niveau de difficulté auquel le personnage est confronté lorsqu'il teste certaines compétences est affiché. Cela vous permet de mieux appréhender la réussite de vos actions.

languages.text: Bu ayar, diyaloglarda yetenek testi zorluğunun gösterilmesi özelliğini açıp kapatmanı sağlar. Ayarı etkinleştirdiğinde, karakterinin belirli yetenek testlerini geçmesi için aşması gereken zorluk seviyesini göreceksin. Bu sayede eylemlerinin ne denli başarılı olduğunu anlayabilirsin.
languages.original_text: This setting allows you to turn the displaying of skill test difficulty in dialogues on or off. When the setting is enabled, you will see the level of difficulty that the character needs to overcome when testing certain skills. This will help you better understand how successful your actions are.
